page.title: 19A day at Durweston School
page.content: The caretaker arrives first, then the teachers arrive. The Bryanston bus arrives, most people start coming, then the Stourpaine bus comes. School starts at 9.10am. I look at the temperature: the lowest has been -9C, the highest +20C. The first lesson is Handwriting, and someone writes about our School pond. The next lesson is Maths, before it's playtime. After that we go to Assembly in the Hall, where we sing a hymn, have a story about Jesus, and say some prayers. We do a 'Reading Route' card, then we have dinner. We play, then we finish our reading before we go out for Rounders. When that is over we show our teacher our Domesday folder, then we clear away. Someone says a made-up prayer for us and we go home at 3.30pm.
